alert.note: Alert for Livingston (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 01 at 8:36AM EDT until September 03 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Michigan... Huron River Near Hamburg affecting Livingston County. For the Huron River...including Milford, Hamburg, Ann Arbor...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Huron River near Hamburg. * WHEN...Until Sunday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM EDT Friday the stage was 7.2 feet. - Bankfull stage is 6.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Sunday morning and continue falling to 6.0 feet Friday, September 08. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=DTX. The next statement will be issued this evening at 845 PM EDT.
